attributes.action: Remove the Think U Know campagn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This pathetic website does not encourage safety on the internet. It is just a website saying 'HOWDEY' every time you ipen internet explorer which is quickly canged for another. And it wastes time when students could be learning they are watching a video of a child meeting a 30 year old in a park. Children know the basics of intenet safety, so at last let them choose their own homepage!
